comment.author: 61223299@N00
comment._content:
Corner of Lower Fort St and Argyle St. Three bridges over Argyle Cut are visible: -

1. Princes Street - now completely lost to the Bradfield Highway. As are those steps leading up to it. Looks like the Cut was also widened when the highway went in.
2. Cumberland Street - this still has a bridge over the cut, though it is not arched as per this picture
3. Gloucester Street - Gloucester Street now no longer makes it as far as Argyle St - so no need for a bridge!

See [http://www.flickr.com/photos/noctorum/8199274598/in/photostream]
